EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-04-26-AWS-VS-Azure-Webinar.Thanks for joining us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining the {{my.Webinar Title:default=edit me}} yesterday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for joining us at the {{my.Webinar Title:default=edit me}} yesterday.
You can view the recording here <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/which-cloud-webinar-v-1]]>.
If you prefer to speak directly with our team in order to learn more about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please schedule a meeting with us <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you'd like to learn more about how to accelerate your cloud migration process, please check out our Learning Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]>!
